initial.description: Specifies that all the element's properties should be changed to their initial values.

inherit.description: Specifies that all the element's properties should be changed to their inherited values.

revert.description: Reverts the filter to the parent.

revert-layer.description: Specifies that all the element's properties should roll back the cascade to a previous cascade layer, if one exists. If no other cascade layer exists, the element's properties will roll back to the matching rule, if one exists, in the current layer or to a previous style origin.

unset.description: Specifies that all the element's properties should be changed to their inherited values if they inherit by default, or to their initial values if not.
